mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Nixon, G. T. A. to Crothers, H. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nixon, G. T. A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col H.W. Crothers Wheeling Nov 13 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 13 1861. But two hundred and fifty eight 218 of those guns are captured arms I will confer with Capt Crispin at Bellaire in regard to them Know nothing of the order. G.T.A. Nixon Ordnance Lieutenant USA 29W92Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nixon, G. T. A.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Crothers, H. W.
